entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, 0.8°C

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight with 40 percent chance of showers before morning. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the morning then west 40 gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 near Juan de Fuca Strait late in the afternoon. High 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 near Juan de Fuca Strait early in the evening. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 in the evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 20 January 2023
